properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Glory, glory to God
Glory to God in the highest. x2
On earth peace be to
men of good will.
Peace to men of good will. x3

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God we praise you
God we bless you.
We adore you our Father
glorify you.
We give you thanks
for your glory Lord our God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Heavenly King
almighty God.
Lord Jesus Christ Son Of God
begotten Son
of the Father.
Lord lamb of God Son of God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You take away
sins of the world.
Oh God receive our prayers.
You are seated
at the right hand
of God mighty our Father.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Have mercy Lord
for you alone
are holy one and the Lord.
You are alone
the most high with
Holy spirit all the time.
